venue.fullName: Strahan Arena at the University Events Center

article.headline: SE Louisiana 64, Texas State 63
article.story: SAN MARCOS, Texas (AP) -- Michael Gardener scored 22 points and Southeastern Louisiana held off a late rally by Texas State for a 64-63 win Thursday night. Southeastern Louisiana (14-4, 6-1 Southland) lead 49-39 with 16:08 remaining before Texas State (11-8, 6-2) took a 55-54 lead with 6:05 left. The Bobcats had increased their lead to 59-56 at the 4:27 mark. The Lions then outscored Texas State 8-4 in the game's final minutes, with Michael Gardener hitting two free throws with 1:46 to take a 64-61 lead. Zach Allison scored 17 points and Terry Conerway had 14 for Texas State.
